SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Configure the Layout Options Available for the Product List Page

Equip buyers with tools for personalizing their experience when browsing the Product List page. Admins can enforce a default user experience for buyers, and determine which options are available on the page for buyers to customize the experience.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.


B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To access CC Admin and change settings:	Access B2B Commerce for Visualforce Admin Settings permission set

Populate the following layout options that a buyer can control on the Product List page:

Page Size (1)
The number of products to show on the page at once. You can configure multiple picklist values, and specify the default value. If the current number of results exceeds the selected page size, the Product List page provides pagination controls to navigate to the full results.
Layout (2)
Whether to show the results in a grid or in a list. You can make both options available and specify which layout is selected by default, or you can make only one layout available.
NOTE
The Product List page can display at most 100,000 entitled products for a selected category.
Due to SOSL query limits, the Product List page can display at most 2,000 entitled products for a search query.

To configure the layout options available on the Product List page, update your storefront configuration settings.

On the CC Admin tab in your org, select your storefront (1).
In the Storefront Settings menu, select Configuration Settings (2).
From the Module picklist, select Product List (3).
Specify the available layout options.
Find the Layout Options configuration (4), and find its value (5).
list, grid
Both list and grid layouts are available. List is selected by default when the Product List page loads results, but the buyer can switch to grid.
grid, list
Both list and grid layouts are available. Grid is selected by default when the Product List page loads results, but the buyer can switch to list.
list
Only the list layout is available. The buyer can't switch the layout to grid.
grid
Only the grid layout is available. The buyer can't switch the layout to list.
If you're satisfied with the specified layout options, skip this step.
If you want to change the available layout options, or if Layout Options doesn't exist, click New , and continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product List
Configuration	Layout Options
Page	PLP
Value	
list, grid
grid, list
list
grid
Configure options for the page size picklist.
Find the Page Size Options configuration (6), and find its value (7).

The value of the configuration is a comma-separated list of available picklist options, such as 10,25,50,75.

If you're satisfied with the available options, skip this step.
If you want to change the available options, or if Page Size Options doesn't exist, click New , and continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product List
Configuration	Page Size Options
Page	PLP
Value	A comma-separated list of picklist options, such as 5,15,30,100.
Specify the default value for the page size picklist.
Find the Default Page Size configuration (8), and find its value (9).

The value must match one of the available Page Size Options picklist values.

If you're satisfied with the specified default size, skip this step.
If you want to change the specified default size, or if Default Page Size doesn't exist, continue to the next step.
Click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Product List
Configuration	Default Page Size
Page	PLP
Value	The value from the Page Size Options picklist that you want to be selected by default. For example, if you changed the available picklist values to be 5, 15, 30, and 100 and you want to make 15 the default, enter 15.
Build and activate a new configuration cache.
SEE ALSO
Specify Extra Results Buffer for the Product List Page

title: Configuring B2B Commerce Layout Options
